title: 2020 Presidential Candidate Tim Ryan
itunes:title: 2020 Presidential Candidate Tim Ryan
description:
Kevin spoke with Joel Payne, Democratic Strategist and former Director of African-American media outreach for Hillary Clinton's presidential campaign, and Brad Blakeman, Republican Strategist and former Deputy Assistant to Pres. George W. Bush. They discussed the census, Iran and Jeffrey Epstein.

Kevin also spoke with Presidential Candidate, Tim Ryan, on Epstein and his campaign.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
